question: Gamkhap and Mauhak are the local names of the sacred groves of which of the following states?
explanation: Gamkhap and Mauhak (sacred bamboo reserves) are the local names of the sacred groves of Manipur. They are total 166 in number. The deities to whom these groves are dedicated include Umanglai, Ebudhou Pakhangba, Konthoujam Lairembi, Chabugbam and Chothe Thayai Pakhangba.
